String.string: Go to Clahk near the Training Ground in Highwatch.

Destroy the Priest Buff Stone or Mystic Buff Stone two times.
The Training Ground is a dungeon for simulating your skills. You do not have to clear this dungeon.
Leave the dungeon after you simulate your skills at the training monsters.
Use the Captivity Stone to empower the Eternal Crown. [Press key to open your inventory and select the Captivity Stone.]
